alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Coosa; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 7:27AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Chilton, southwestern Shelby, southeastern Bibb and west central Coosa Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 726 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Talladega National Forest, or near Centreville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Calera, Montevallo, Columbiana, Jemison, Thorsby, Wilton, Gap Of The Mountain, American Village, Lawley, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Lay Lake Dam, University Of Montevallo, Talladega National Forest, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Shelby County Airport, Lay Lake, Mitchell Lake and Shelby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
